title: Hermitcraft 8 Episode 20: I'M LEAVING!
author: GoodTimesWithScar
description:
Only a few days left for Limited Time Swaggon Merch link: https://represent.com/store/goodtimeswithscar

Hermitcraft season 8 episode 19! We start out Ep 19 of Hermitcraft S8 by finding the Moon is getting out of hand and we are leaving Hermitcraft on a Swaggon rocket with the rest of the Boatem. I set up Offworld Escapes travel agency to sell tickets and in the process, I become the richest Hermit with all the diamonds! I can't wait for you to see what I have planned for the next episode of Hermitcraft!


Hermitcraft Season 8 playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSCZsQa9VSCdDJmIMkIuK0XazfnI677oV

---------------------------------------------------------
Hermitcraft SMP - season 8 info:

We have 2 new Hermitcraft members for the new season: 
*GeminiTay: https://www.youtube.com/user/GeminiTard
*PearlescentMoon: https://www.youtube.com/c/PearlescentMoon

We are all playing and building on one big Hermit island together with Minecraft proximity voice chat mod. 

Seed: -7381235180058670651

For more information and links to all things Hermitcraft, follow the link to the Hermitcraft website: https://hermitcraft.com/
